original_text: And thou shalt bring the meat offering that is made of these things unto the Lord: and when it is presented unto the priest, he shall bring it unto the altar.
korean_text: 너는 이것들로 만든 소제물을 여호와께로 가져다가 제사장에게 줄 것이요 제사장은 그것을 제단으로 가져가서

sentences.original_text: And thou shalt bring the meat offering
that is made of these things
and when it is presented unto the priest,
he shall bring it unto the altar.
